page.title: 17The Hollies,
page.content:
THE HOLLIES.
The Hollies scheme in Midsomer Norton has been developed over the last year. It was due to open last christmas, but because it wasn't ready they moved the date forward to July. Then they moved the date forward again and it should be opening on the 16th of August . The biggest part of the Hollies development will house a new supermarket called Safeway's which is a big establishment. It will also contain lots of different shops in a pedestrian precinct. Some of these include: a newsagent, a dry cleaners, a car accesory shop, a coffee bar and asome kiosks. This development has caused alot of argument locally. It was built on the site of a public garden and improve the existing council offices.
